1.definition: to take voluntarily (a child of other parents) as one's own child esp. in compliance with formal legal procedures see also

2.definition: to take or accept as if one's own [[the company]the signature on the financing statement ", 816 F.2d 1267 (1987)"]
2.ed: the signature on the financing statement "

3.definition: to accept formally and put into effect [ a constitutional amendment]
